A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My biggest issue with this film is that its really a great film. A marvelous film and everyone should go see it. I don't feel like its a Star Wars film though. This movie is fantastic as a sci fy film with action scenes and space battles\, but the lore of the Star Wars franchise is missing. Its like they didn't even want to try and tie in the character developement we already knew and loved from Episodes 4-7. Yes I even included The Force Awakens. This was a huge opportunity that Rian Johnson and LucasFilm missed out on...
